Rulings.Edison:
●The you in on your side of the field is the current controller’s field, so as long as Ultimate Insect LV1 is face-up, it is always face-up on your side of the field.
●Ultimate Insect LV1’s 2nd sentence is a Ignition Effect that is activated by sending Ultimate Insect LV1 to the GY as a cost. You can chain to this effect.
●You can't activate the effect of Ultimate Insect LV1 the same turn it is flipped face-up, including by Book of Taiyou, etc.

Rulings.Base: 1. The 'you' in 'on your side of the field' is the current controller's field, so as long as "Ultimate Insect LV1" is face-up, it is always 'face-up on your side of the field'.\n2. The 2nd sentence of "Ultimate Insect LV1" is a Ignition Effect that is activated by sending "Ultimate Insect LV1" to the GY as a cost. You can chain to this effect.\n3. You cannot activate the effect of "Ultimate Insect LV1" the same turn it is flipped face-up, including by "Book of Taiyou", etc.
